definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.chinese: 鱼饵香气四溢，味道鲜美。

sentences.english: My friend said she never forget the delicious of the soup.
sentences.chinese: 朋友说，她这辈子也忘不了那锅鱼汤的鲜美。

sentences.english: The fish is so fresh, it is like a fish jumped on the table and cooked itself.
sentences.chinese: 活像是鱼自己跳上桌面瞬间煮熟般鲜美。

sentences.english: Do you love all kinds of seafood?
sentences.chinese: 你是否希望吃上一盘鲜美的鱼？

sentences.english: Someone feel leg meat is delicious.
sentences.chinese: 也有人觉得蟹脚上的肉是最鲜美的。

sentences.english: Such fish-meat tastes refreshing and delicate with extraordinarily delicious juice.
sentences.chinese: 松鼠鱼的鱼肉爽滑细腻，汤汁鲜美异常。

sentences.english: With current wine, meat will be tasted more delicious; furthermore, we can further appreciate the delicious meat.
sentences.chinese: 吃一口肉喝一口酒，会让你更能体会出肉的鲜美。

sentences.english: A delicious drink, a complete food, a New Year's tribute of our foodstuff factory.
sentences.chinese: 鲜美饮料，全能营养，本食品厂新年新奉献。

sentences.english: This cooking way can make the shell more red, and the meat more tasty.
sentences.chinese: 这种烹饪方法能使虾壳看上去更红，肉质更鲜美。

sentences.english: The steamed cod in banana leaf is delicious, and the vegetarian options are plenty. (6433-5126,  www.lostheaven.com.cn/)
sentences.chinese: 蕉叶蒸鳕鱼味道鲜美，素食选择也很多。

sentences.english: Because put ho, eat up and soft and sweet, flavour is delicious.
sentences.chinese: 因为放了蚝，吃起来又软又香，味道鲜美。

sentences.english: Aristichthys Nobilis diseased less, growing fast, tasty when cooked.
sentences.chinese: 鳙鱼病害少，生长快，肉质鲜美。

sentences.english: I think the flavor of fresh strawberries is out of this world.
sentences.chinese: 我认为新鲜草莓的味道鲜美无比。

sentences.english: The most miraculous, magnificent and fresh writing is usually found in the Taoist Canon.
sentences.chinese: 天下极神奇极壮丽极鲜美文字，多在道藏。

sentences.english: She said that this lack of delicious soup pot is mainly due to the lack of an atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 她说，这锅汤不够鲜美的主要原因是缺少一种情调。

sentences.english: The flesh of this kind of fish has exceptional delicacy.

definition: umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
taste/texture (of food)/how food feels in the mouth
